resources.string: Wagertool KIT will help you understand better how you can take full advantage of the Wagertool® trading software in your mobile Android device.

Wagertool® mobile app look and behave look and feel native because they are. It looks and behave the way you expect.

Ladder view, 
 Grid view, 
 Price-volume chart, 
 Personalized filters, 
 Automation trading options, 
 Recent opened markets, 
 Global or individual quick cashout, 
 Quick management of unmatched bets, 
 4 different staking modes, 
 Personalized stake list, 
 Soccer and tennis livescores, 
 Info of tv or livestream broadcast, 
 Search events by keywords, 
 Search events by tree view.
Click to view the full user guide and learn all the tricks and capabilities of Wagertool® trading software.
The user guide has all the functions available in the Windows desktop version. Wagertool® is a multi-platform software available for all your devices included in a single subscription plan.
